org.netbeans.core.network.proxy.pac

Interface PacScriptEvaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NbPacScriptEvaluator, PacScriptEvaluatorNoProxy

    public interface PacScriptEvaluator
    PAC Script evaluator.

    This is a bridge between Java and the PAC script, which is implemented in JavaScript. PacScriptEvaluators are created via PacScriptEvaluatorFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • findProxyForURL

        List<Proxy> findProxyForURL(URI uri)
                     throws PacValidationException
        Returns the proxy/proxies appropriate to use for the given URI.

        The method calls the JavaScript FindProxyForURL(url, host) function in the PAC script (or alternatively the FindProxyForURLEx(url, host) function), parses the result and returns it as a prioritized list of proxies.

        Parameters:
        uri - URI to get proxies for.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PacValidationException - when the result from the JavaScript function cannot be interpreted.

      • usesCaching

        boolean usesCaching()
        Returns if the Evaluator uses result caching or not. Result caching speeds up execution as a call to Java method findProxyForURL(java.net.URI) will not result in a call to JavaScript function FindProxyForURL if the URL has been resolved previously. But the Evaluator cannot use caching if the PAC Script uses methods which depends on time and the Evaluator may therefore have decided to turn off result caching.

        If an implementation of PacScriptEvaluator never uses result caching (because it simply isn't implemented) then this method will always return false.

        Returns:

      • getJsEntryFunction

        String getJsEntryFunction()
        Gets the entry function to the PAC script which the engine uses.
        Returns:
        name of JavaScript function

      • getEngineInfo

        String getEngineInfo()
        Gets relevant information about the engine, typically the name of the JavaScript engine (e.g. 'Nashorn'), version number, etc.
        Returns:
        info

      • getPacScriptSource

        String getPacScriptSource()
        Gets the JavaScript source code of the PAC script.
        Returns:
        source code
